column2: "Afei nna Josua ayɛ akɔdaa na oedzi mfe ara yie; na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Ayɛ akɔdaa na edzi mfe ara yie
column4: na asaase a aka so dɛ wɔkɛfa no dɔɔ so dodow."

column2: "Asaase a aka no so nye yi: Filistiafo mbew no nyinara
"ofi Sihor a ɔwɔ Egypt n’enyim araa dze kodu Ekron kwaamu afamu he do a wɔkan ka Keenanfo ho: Filistiafo ahemfo beenum no; Gazafo dze
column8: "wɔ pomu afamu: Keenanfo asaase no nyinara nye Meara a ɔyɛ Zidonfo dze no
column9: dze kodu Afek dze kodu Amorifo he do:"

column2: "nye Gebalfo asaase
column5: fi Baal-gad wɔ bepɔw Hermon ase dze rekɛhɛn Hamat:"

column2: "hɔn a wɔtse nkokodo nkurow no mu nyinara
column3: ofi Lebanon ho dze kodu Mesrɛfɔt-maim
column4: mekyerɛ Zidonfo nyinara; mara na mubotu hɔn efi Israelmba enyim: na ɔwo dze
column5: kyɛ ara na twe tonto kyɛ ma ɔnyɛ egyapadze mma Israel

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei kyɛ asaase yi ma ɔnyɛ egyapadze mma ebusuakuw akron no
"Reubenfo nye Gadfo ka Manaasɛ ɔfa kor no so ho nyaa hɔn egyapadze a Moses dze maa hɔn wɔ Jordan egya boka afamu no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses dze maa hɔn no ara pɛ;"

column2: "ofi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon ɔbɔn ano
column3: nye kurow no a ɔwɔ ɔbɔn no finimfin
column4: nye Medeba tɛtɛr mu nyinara dze kodu Dibon;"

column2: "na Amorifo hen Sihon a odzi hen wɔ Hesbon no
"nye Gilead
column3: nye Gersurfo nye Maakatfo he do
column5: nye Basan nyinara dze kodu Saleka;"

column2: "Ɔge a odzii hen wɔ Astarot nye Edrei n’ahenman a ɔwɔ Basan no nyinara (ɔnoara na ɔkae wɔ Refaim nkaa no mu); na woyinom na Moses kum hɔn
"Naaso Israelmba enntu Gersurfo no
column3: nye Maakatfo no so: mbom Gesur nye Maakat tsenaa Israel mu

column2: "Levi ebusuakuw no nko na ɔamma no egyapadze bi; osiandɛ EWURADZE
column4: n’afɔrbɔdze a wɔdze ogya bɔ no na ɔyɛ n’egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na Moses dze maa Reubenmba ebusuakuw no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
"Na hɔn he fi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon ɔbɔn no ano
column3: nye kurow a ɔwɔ ɔbɔn no finimfin no
column4: nye Medeba ho tɛtɛr mu no nyinara;"

column2: "Hesbon
column3: nye no nkurow a ɔwɔ tɛtɛr mu no nyinara; Dibon

column2: "nye Jahaz
"nye Kiriataim
column4: nye Zeret-sahar wɔ ɔbɔn no mu bepɔw do;"

column2: "nye Bɛt-peor
"nye tɛtɛrmu nkurow no nyinara
column3: nye Amorifo hen Sihon a odzii hen wɔ Hesbon no n’ahenman nyinara
column4: ɔno na Moses dze no kaa Midian asafohemfo no ho kum hɔn no
column10: Sihon ne mbapɔmba a wɔtsenaa asaase no do no."

column2: "Balaam
column5: Israelmba dze afona kum no foraa hɔn atɔfun nkaa no mu."

column2: "Na Reubenmba no hɔn he nye Jordan
column3: nye ne he. Iyi nye Reubenmba no hɔn egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee

column2: "Na Moses dze maa Gad ebusuakuw no
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Na hɔn he nye Jazer
column4: na Ammonmba asaase no ne fa
column5: dze kodu Aroer a ɔwɔ Rabaa enyim no;"

column2: "na ofi Hesbon dze kodu Ramat-mizpe nye Bɛtonim; na ofi Mahanaim dze kodu Debir he do;"
"nye ɔbɔn no mu
column9: dze kodu Kinneret po no n’ano noho Jordan egya boka afamu."

column2: "Iyi nye Gadmba no hɔn egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
"Na Moses dze egyapadze maa Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no: na ɔyɛɛ Manaasɛmba ebusuakuw fa no dze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
"Na hɔn he fi Mahanaim
column5: nye Jair no nkurow a ɔwɔ Basan nyinara

column2: "na Gilead ne fa
column5: Ɔge n’ahenman mu nkurow a ɔwɔ Basan no ɔyɛɛ Manaasɛ ne babanyin Makir ne mba no dze
column6: mekyerɛ Makirmba no hɔn fa no a
column7: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Iyi nye egyapadze a Moses kyɛɛ no Moab tɛtɛr mu
column3: Jeriko Jordan egya boka afamu no."

column2: "Na Levi ebusuakuw dze
column3: Moses amma hɔn egyapadze bi: osiandɛ EWURADZE
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn no."
